supplementary_data.miRNA_coordinates: SELECT transcript_id,value as miRNA_coordinates FROM transcript_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=15
supplementary_data.frameshift: SELECT transcript_id, value AS frameshift FROM transcript_attrib  WHERE attrib_type_id=59
supplementary_data.ncRNA: SELECT transcript_id, value AS ncRNA FROM transcript_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=62
supplementary_data.MANE_select: SELECT transcript_id, value AS MANE_select FROM transcript_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=535
supplementary_data.MANE_plus_clinical: SELECT transcript_id, value AS MANE_plus_clinical FROM transcript_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=550
supplementary_data.GO: select t.transcript_id, x.display_label AS go_terms from transcript t join object_xref ox on (t.transcript_id = ox.ensembl_id and ox.ensembl_object_type = 'Transcript') join xref x on (ox.xref_id = x.xref_id)  where x.external_db_id = 1000
